message: Hello Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer. I would like to make a counteroffer at $160.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $170, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I'd like to counter with $165.
I'm still interested in finding a mutually beneficial deal, Bob. I can meet you at $175, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. Is that something you'd be comfortable with?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to counter with $170.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can meet you at $180, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're interested
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with $175.
I've decided to sell the product to someone else, so I'll be moving on. Thanks for the negotiation, Bob!
